bib.title: UCSG-Net--Unsupervised Discovering of Constructive Solid Geometry Tree
bib.author: Kania, Kacper and Zi{\k{e}}ba, Maciej and Kajdanowicz, Tomasz
bib.abstract: Signed distance field (SDF) is a prominent implicit representation of 3D meshes. Methods that are based on such representation achieved state-of-the-art 3D shape reconstruction quality. However, these methods struggle to reconstruct non-convex shapes. One remedy is to incorporate a constructive solid geometry framework (CSG) that represents a shape as a decomposition into primitives.
